description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Uh-oh!! Humanity is in trouble now. Zombies have evolved. They've realized that brains taste like, well, brains and they're now after your favorite calorie laden snacks instead. It's up to you to stop them -- blast them, fry them, burn them, launch them off the kitchen table. Whatever you do, KEEP THOSE DAMN DIRTY ZOMBIE HANDS OFF YOUR COOKIEZ!!!
description.short: Uh-oh!! Humanity is in trouble now. Zombies have evolved. They've realized that brains taste like, well, brains and they're now after your favorite calorie laden snacks instead. It's up to you to stop them -- blast them, fry them, burn them, launch them off the kitchen table. Whatever you do, KEEP THOSE DAMN DIRTY ZOMBIE HANDS OFF YOUR COOKIEZ!!!
